resources.string:
TO USE THIS APP
 1.ENTER THE IP ADSRESS OF YOUR LOCAL SERVER
 2.ENTER THE PORT SERVER
 3.SELECT IMAGE FROM YOUR PHONE GALLERY OR CAMERA
 4.CLICK ON CONNECT TO SERVER AND UPLOAD
 WAIT FOR A WHILE TO GET IMAGE UPLOADED ON LOCAL SERVER
 5.WHEN DONE CLICK ON SHOW LAST ENCRYPTED IMAGE YOU WILL GET ENCRYPTED IMAGE
 6.FOR DECRYPTION CLICK ON SHOW LAST DECRYPTED IMAGE

 FOR ANY FURTHER QUERY FEEL FREE TO CONTACT:

 1.KISHAN GROVER - Kishan.grover@yahoo.com

ImageED IS BASICALLY SYMMETRIC AND LIGHTWEIGHT IMAGE ENCRYPTION TECHNOLOGY,CELLUAR AUTOMATA IS USED FOR IMAGE ENCRYPTION DEVELOPED BY-
